summary:
Profile and Skills
*Hands-on mentality, practical and proactive  
*Innovative and creative on manufacturing, projects, products and processes thus able to raise the added value  
*Extensive experience in technically and international oriented companies as a manager for products, projects, supply chain and purchasing.  
*Experience with machinery for various industries such as food, automotive, offshore and  industrial water treatment 
*Affinity with technique  
*Multi-disciplinary, technical, commercial and management skills supported by technical and managerial training Bachelor 
*Can work well together with the various disciplines internally and externally 
*Expert in maintaining and developing supplier and customer relations

projects.title: Traineeship 1
projects.description:
Ballast Nedam Joint Venture, Rijswijk, Netherlands 
Location of Guyana, South America, responsible for maintenance on all mobile equipment

profile_positions.description:
Global Category Manager

Responsibilities and Projects
o My responsibilities for the Valves and Actuators Category have expanded to an international responsibility
o Extension with the Engineering category
o Reporting to Global Teamleader Category Management
o Management of the Buyer terminal in Vlaardingen and Vlissingen
o Closer cooperation with our terminals in Belgium
profile_positions.title: Global Category Manager

profile_positions.description:
Main activities:
o As Category Manager I am responsible for the purchasing strategy for the categories and locations listed below and I maintain intensive contact with the contracted suppliers
o For each terminal I have regular consultations with my internal stakeholders such as the program manager, project manager, maintenance manager and terminal manager

Responsibilities and Projects
o Responsible for the categories;
   Hiring of personnel, E&I contractors, Valves, Actuators and Instrumentation
o For the terminals;
   Botlek, Europoort, Vlaardingen, Vlissingen and Eemshaven.
o Total expenditure > € 50 million
o Reporting to Global Director Sourcing & Procurement
o Two tenders for the remediation of soil contamination at the Europoort terminal
o Improvement processes with suppliers
o Intensive periodic consultation with suppliers and stakeholders
o Compliance with framework agreements and internal and external (Vopak) procedures
profile_positions.title: Category Manager

profile_positions.description:
Main activities:  
As a project buyer to implement the purchasing processes. Responsible for monitoring the project budget. 
Responsibilities and Projects o Reporting to Unit Manager Purchase & Logistics 
o	Intensive contact with potential suppliers regarding the available capacity for the current project and a possible future project. 
o	Implementation of SAP 
o	Intensive role in the approval of purchases but also the approval of subsequent invoices 
o	Improve purchasing conditions and agree with suppliers. 
o	Active role in the unambiguous archiving of project-related correspondence o Total expenses > € 60 million 
o	Sourcing, ie selecting new suppliers, especially in South America and very premature in Asia 
o	Close contact with project manager and other project team members o Initiator for process improvements
profile_positions.title: Project Buyer

profile_positions.description:
As a project leader, implement a strategic purchasing policy. Responsible for monitoring the budget of the purchasing department and the developments in the market about the availability and price developments of the deliveries. 
Responsibilities and Projects o Reduction of 80% of the number of suppliers for indirect expenses o Within supply chain responsible for the category paint. In cooperation with the various related suppliers (paint, sandpaper, etc.) a time saving of 25% was realized at slightly reduced costs by using a better sandable colored primer. o Logistics responsible for the availability of products from my category. o Responsible for the quality of my category and a leading role in solving quality problems through "five times why" 
o	Intensive cooperation with colleagues within a production company o Start up improvement processes together with selected suppliers o Starting the sourcing of direct materials in Europe as a team 
o	Professionalization of procurement team, including the introduction of category management 
o	Framework agreements with selected suppliers o Total expenses +/- € 4.5 milion
profile_positions.title: Senior Technical Buyer

profile_positions.location: Alphen aan de Rijn and Mexico
profile_positions.description:
Activities 
In close cooperation with the customer responsible for the execution of a project for 
Dragados/Pemex in Mexico regarding two Glycol Recovery Units, order value  +/- € 12 million-procurement value € 8 million. Managing various relevant disciplines like process, mechanical, E&I and finance. 
Responsibilities and Projects o Managing two projects and the execution of orders by project engineers;  o Financial and practical feasibility  o Hours, budget with regard to engineering, workplace and purchase orders 
o	Purchasing materials with regard to budget, delivery date and planning  o Contact with the client  
o	Documents according to the contract  o Invoicing o Authorising purchase orders, quotations and order confirmations  o As a scrum master jointly responsible for the implementation of the scrum methodology in the project consultations 
o	Presiding at production meetings o Presiding HAZard and OPerability meetings  
o	Discussing technical and commercial deviations with regard to the sales stage with the sales department  
o	Settling any problems with clients and/of suppliers o Travelling 25%
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Main Activities  
Responsible for all purchasing activities, subcontracting, storage and logistics for the globe regarding F&B related equipment  
Responsibilities and Projects  o Change management, decentral purchasing into central purchasing for Europe o Product management new unique cleaning tool 
o	Contract management 
o	Responsible for the product portfolio o Reporting to Global Souring Director  o Legal check of agreements o Responsible for savings, new suppliers o Reduction of stock levels in the warehouses o Purchase volume € 60 million o Collaborate with colleagues from all global countries
profile_positions.title: Global Strategic Sourcing Manager F&B Equipment

profile_positions.description:
Main Activities 
Responsible for all long term maintenance related procurement activities for a Private Public Partnership (PPS)
profile_positions.title: Procurement

profile_positions.description:
Activities  
Responsible for all purchasing activities, subcontracting, storage and logistics for three locations in the Netherlands.  Responsibilities and Projects  
o	Reporting to the CFO and member Operating Management Team  
o	Manager of fifteen employees at the three locations operating as “ transactional buyers and warehouse employees 
o	Purchase volume € 30 million from which a big part was delivered by subcontractors o Determination of portfolio according needs from the market o Collaborate with colleagues from other European countries  o Merging of three existing warehouses in a brand new warehouse
profile_positions.title: ManagerPurchasing and Logistics

profile_positions.description:
Main Activities 
Head Responsible for the purchase of all non product-related products and services for four factories and headquarters in the Netherlands  
As Project team member responsible for production facility modifications 
Responsibilities and Projects  
o	Reporting to Purchasing Manager Global Services and Global NPR member buying team  
o	Managing transactional Buyers / Engineers  
o	Purchase volume € 20 mio 
o	Responsible for facility related products including soap for laboratory applications o Member realization project to build new R & D centre and headquarters in Almere, responsible for all related purchases  
o	As buyer responsible for all materials and services regarding a production plant-upgrade 
-----
Main Activities:  
Responsible for restructuring the way products/services were purchased.  Responsibilities and Projects  
o	Reporting to Global Purchasing Manager, Consumables and Services  o Manager of three "Buyers Transactional"  
o	Intensive contacts with European and American colleagues within ICI  o Upgrading production facility in Zwijndrecht
profile_positions.title: Procurement Non Product Related

profile_positions.description:
Main Activities 
As product manager responsible for setting up and managing a new product line. The technical-commercial support of the sales group in Europe (> 170 FTE) and the Middle East.  
Responsibilities, products and Projects  o Reporting to the Marketing Manager Europe  
o	Section Equipment Group Europe "initiative, lead directly and indirectly to 4 FTE to local equipment specialists in the countries France, Germany, Sweden and England  
o	Strategic agreements with OEMs in Germany, America and the Netherlands. 
o	Project leader at supplier-switch at our customers, complete replacement of equipment 
o	Adjustments on standard products according our requirements 
o	Commercial activities including purchasing, pricing, presentations, promotions, promotional material and training for internal and external customers  
o	Translating, build, develop and expand products in consultation with representatives, customers and suppliers, defining the (PDI) Product Description 
Idea, market and technical specifications  o Product training for 170 European sales representatives and our external customers
profile_positions.title: Manager Equipment Group Europe (part of the marketing department)

profile_positions.description:
Main Activities 
Responsible for the whole "trial operations" for the assembly of 5 and 40 unique "standard" separation systems per year, according to strict international offshore, petrochemical and marine specifications. Managing the field engineers. Responsibilities and Projects  
o	Managing and planning of engineers for start-ups of our equipment around the world 
o	Production switched from head-to series production.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

volunteer_experiences.description:
Main Activities o Co Founder of a new local food bank o Acquisition of volunteers, food and money. 
o	Cooperation with suppliers and stakeholders such as supermarkets, municipality and other non-profit organizations 
o	Collaboration with other local food banks and the Dutch food bank  o Establish organizational structure for all volunteers o Responsible for the issue of quality food o Certification Foodbank de Bilt 
o	Responsible for large financial investments as a refrigerated vehicle, fridge and freezer room

Main activities: 
o	Co-organize at least one tour per year
o	Acquire sponsorship money 
o	Financial administration
